attributes.action: Education Secretary to complete a u-turn on proposed new tests for 7 year-olds.
attributes.additional_details:
There is significant evidence against testing as a method.  Here is some.

http://www.salon.com/2015/10/28/arne_duncans_race_to_the_bottom_our_national_test_fixation_isnt_just_bad_for_kids_it_doesnt_even_work/

attributes.background: The Education Secretary is proposing new 'robust and rigorous' tests for 7 year-olds. Her reason is to tackle under-achievement.  This is counter-intuitive and the real need is to return the teaching labour force to realistic levels by creating an environment where people want to teach as a career.
